title: Unit IV-1 at Nichoria
description: Unit IV-1 is a large, megaron-style building constructed during the 11th century BCE at the site of Nichoria in Messenia, Greece.

properties.description: The location of the Dark Age apsidal megaron Unit IV-1 at Nichoria, determined from comparison of satellite imagery with published plans.
properties.title: Imagery location of Unit IV-1 at Nichoria
